plot: Impressed by those guys who sway their hips to the sound of digital rhythms? How on earth do they go about finding such personal choreographies? Just have a look at this dance lesson and you may find yourself less admiring. Or maybe more!
title: La leçon de danse
plot_es: Impressed by those guys who sway their hips to the sound of digital rhythms? How on earth do they go about finding such personal choreographies? Just have a look at this dance lesson and you may find yourself less admiring. Or maybe more!
